summary: Accounting application (v1 draft deployed) with planned improvements; user requests full Arabic language support across the entire app.
architectural_notes: Plan for full localization/i18n support with Arabic (RTL) across UI, field labels, invoices, and reports.

existing_features.title: Translate all user-visible UI text in the frontend to Arabic across the entire app, including authentication screens, navigation, pages (Dashboard, Subscribers, Monthly Billing), dialogs, form labels/placeholders, table headers, empty states, button labels, and toast notifications.

Add right-to-left (RTL) layout support for Arabic, including setting the document language/direction appropriately and ensuring main app layouts (header, nav, forms, tables, dialogs) render correctly in RTL.
Localize month names and any date-related labels shown in month/year selectors and billing headings to Arabic.

new_feature_requests.summary: Full Arabic localization of the entire app UI (fields, invoices, reports)

projectName: Full Arabic localization (RTL) across the accounting app UI
